title: Eurostar's latest sale has seats from £29 to Paris and Brussels but be quick
text:

Eurostar is giving holidaymakers the chance to bag a cheap last minute break for 2019 with a brand new sale.

The high-speed rail service has slashed prices on seats to Paris, Brussels, Lille and Calais - and there are currently fares from £29 each way up for grabs.

(If Paris is top of your list list, there are some great cheap hotels in the city to stretch that budget a little further).

You can already book the deals on the Eurostar website but you'll want to do so by Tuesday 29th October when the sale ends.

It's also worth noting that the cheapest fares are subject to availability so if you do find your perfect deal it may be worth snapping it up.

There's quite a generous travel window on offer for passengers too, as the deals are valid for travel between the 5th November 2019 through to the 23rd January 2020.

(Image: Getty)

Basically, ideal timing for the Christmas markets season - or simply if you've got some annual leave you're looking to use up.

The best part is that Eurostar has also slashed prices in its Standard Premier carriages, with fares going from £70 each way in the sale.

Standard Premier comes with plenty of extra perks for passengers including more space on board, a light meal and refreshments served directly to your seat, and even a selection of complimentary magazines.

If you are hoping to do a spot of sightseeing at some of the cities' top museums but don't want to blow all of your holiday budget, then make sure you take your Eurostar ticket with you to the entrance.

That's because you can bag 2-for-1 entry at a host of museums and galleries in the likes of Paris or Brussels, simply by showing your Eurostar ticket at the gate. You can find out more here .
description: Eurostar's latest sale has seats from £29 to a host of destinations and there are deals on its Standard Premier carriages too
